Thermodynamics¶

Contains functions for computing thermodynamic data.

class ising.thermo.ThermoStrategy[source]¶

Represents a strategy for calculating the thermodynamic properties. It is an abstract method that implements ising.despats.singleton.Singleton.

partition(hamilt, length, temp, boltzmann)[source]¶

Finds the partition function.

Abstractmethod

Parameters

  • hamilt (ising.hamiltonian.Hamiltonian) – The ising.hamiltonian.Hamiltonian object to pull properties from.

  • length (int) – The number of positions in the Ising configuration.

  • temp (float) – The temperature to run this compuation at.

  • boltzmann (float) – The value of the Boltzmann constant to use.

Returns

The value of the partition function.

average(func, hamilt, length, temp, boltzmann, \*args, \*\*kwargs)[source]¶

Finds the expectation value of a function weighted by the Boltzmann distribution.

Abstractmethod

Parameters

  • func (func(spins: ising.spins.SpinConfig, *args, **kwargs)) – The function to average. *args and **kwargs are passed to this function directly.

  • hamilt (ising.hamiltonian.Hamiltonian) – The Hamiltonian to pull properties from.

  • length (int) – The number of positions in the Ising system.

  • temp (float) – The temperature to run the computation at.

  • boltzmann (float) – The value of the Boltzmann constant.

Returns

The average value of the function.

variance(func, hamilt, length, temp, boltzmann, \*args, \*\*kwargs)[source]¶
Finds the variance of a function weighted by the Boltzmann distribution.
Abstractmethod

Parameters

  • func (func(spins: ising.spins.SpinConfig, *args, **kwargs)) – The function to average. *args and **kwargs are passed to this function directly.

  • hamilt (ising.hamiltonian.Hamiltonian) – The Hamiltonian to pull properties from.

  • length (int) – The number of positions in the Ising system.

  • temp (float) – The temperature to run the computation at.

  • boltzmann (float) – The value of the Boltzmann constant.

Returns

The variance of the function.

class ising.thermo.ThermoMethod[source]¶

Holds the current method for calculating thermodynamic properties. Initialized to ising.thermo.FullCalcsStrategy.

setstrat(strat)[source]¶

Sets the strategy to use.

Parameters

strat (ising.thermo.ThermoStrategy) – The strategy instance to use.

getstrat()[source]¶

Gets the current strategy instance.

Returns

The current strategy instance.

partition(hamilt, length, temp = 298.15, boltzmann = :py:data:`ising.constants.BOLTZMANN_K`)[source]¶

Calculates the partition function using the current strategy.

Parameters

  • hamilt (ising.hamiltonian.Hamiltonian) – The Hamiltonian object to pull data from.

  • length (int) – The number of positions in the Ising configuration.

  • temp (float) – The temperature to calculate at. Defaults to 298.15 K.

  • boltzmann (float) – The value of the Boltzmann constant. Defaults to ising.constants.BOLTZMANN_K.

Returns

The value of the partition function.

average(func, hamilt, length, temp = 298.15, boltzmann = :py:data:`ising.constants.BOLTZMANN_K`, \*args, \*\*kwargs)[source]¶

Calculates the average value of a function.

Parameters

  • func (func(spin : ising.spins.SpinConfig, *args, **kwargs)) – The function to average. \*args and \*\*kwargs are passed directly to this function.

  • hamilt (ising.hamiltonian.Hamiltonian) – The Hamiltonian to pull data from.

  • length (int) – The number of positions in the Ising configuration.

  • temp (float) – The temperature to calculate at. Defaults to 298.15 K.

  • boltzmann (float) – The value of the Boltzmann constant. Defaults to ising.constants.BOLTZMANN_K.

Returns

The average value of the function.

variance(func, hamilt, length, temp = 298.15, boltzmann = :py:data:`ising.constants.BOLTZMANN_K`, \*args, \*\*kwargs)[source]¶

Calculates the variance of a function.

Parameters

  • func (func(spin : ising.spins.SpinConfig, *args, **kwargs)) – The function to find the variance of. \*args and \*\*kwargs are passed directly to this function.

  • hamilt (ising.hamiltonian.Hamiltonian) – The Hamiltonian to pull data from.

  • length (int) – The number of positions in the Ising configuration.

  • temp (float) – The temperature to calculate at. Defaults to 298.15 K.

  • boltzmann (float) – The value of the Boltzmann constant. Defaults to ising.constants.BOLTZMANN_K.

Returns

The variance of the function.

class ising.thermo.FullCalcStrategy[source]¶

An implementation of ising.thermo.ThermoStrategy that runs for each possible spin configuration.
